title: Broken!
body:
So we got stuck in the champ select after the update...................... Please fix 
[](http://imgur.com/MXZ3Hcm)

replies.body:
Hi Guys,

We're aware of this issue and are investigating  - [we're tracking this issue in this thread. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-server-issues-28th-jan-2015)

> [{quoted}](name=EzioDuong,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7j1TGbeM,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-27T22:57:00.737+0000)
>
> So we got stuck in the champ select after the update...................... Please fix 
> [](http://imgur.com/MXZ3Hcm)

Actually not stuck, I had the same problem and one of the player said it sometimes happen for some reason, just take a long time to get in... I feel like the new patch is slower on loading though...
So we got in the game after a while tried to reconnect and we got a 2v5 game lmao
Yeah same here, thought it was just me. Loss prevention?
Yeah same here, thought it was just me. Loss prevention?
